sentences.en: CONCLUSION Alcohol sedimentation a better method in extracting monoterpene glycoside.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The contents of total flavonoids aglycone and glycoside are highest in the traditional harvesting time.
sentences.cn: 结论: 黄酮类成分含量在传统的采收期间达到最高.

sentences.en: Conclusion: The new monoterpene glycoside was identified as 4 " - hydroxyl - albiflorin. "
sentences.cn: 结论: 新化合物命名为 4″- 羟基白芍苷.

sentences.en: During the preparation , the content of rhodiola glycoside is controlled through polarographic analysis.
sentences.cn: 其中, 红景天苷的含量是由极谱分析控制的.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To establish an HPLC method to determine the content of Stilbene glycoside in Tiaojingbaidai pill.
sentences.cn: 目的: 建立以高效液相色谱法测定调经白带丸中二苯乙烯苷含量的方法.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate effects of total paeony glycoside ( TPG ) on cerebral ischemia mice.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察赤芍总甙对小鼠实验性脑缺血的影响.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To establish the method of determination of the content of astragalus glycoside in Tongsaimai Tablet.
sentences.cn: 目的建立通塞脉片中黄芪甲苷含量的测定方法.

sentences.en: Objective To search for triterpene glycoside with new structure.
sentences.cn: 目的:寻找结构新颖的三萜皂苷类化合物.

sentences.en: Objective: to determine the content of Astragalus Root methyl glycoside in Huanwu thrombolytic capsule.
sentences.cn: 目的: 测定还五溶栓胶囊中黄芪甲苷的含量.

sentences.en: The conclusion was that geranyl glycoside could be used as a flavor material in cigarette flavoring.
sentences.cn: 结论:香叶醇糖苷可以作为香原料应用到卷烟中.

sentences.en: The flavone glycoside content in walnut benevolence is 0.
sentences.cn: 测定核桃仁隔膜中黄酮苷含量为0.

sentences.en: The results suggest that AHL contains a site to bind O glycoside linkage.
sentences.cn: 各种糖的封闭性抑制实验结果与竞争性抑制实验相似.提示AHL上存在O-糖苷键结合位点.

sentences.en: Uva Ursi: Contains the glycoside arbutin, which has antimicrobial properties and acts as a mild diuretic.
